title:
Why is there a sewage odor in the air around the Bradley Creek area. As I\'m driving down Oleander Drive, it\'s somewhere near The Arboretum, and Salt Works Restaurant that I notice the smell. It doesn\'t smell like a low tide smell, so what is it?



Thank you!
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=9262
